languages.text: {n}Воин поднимает бровь.{/n} "А ты точно слуга Императора, а не кукла с рукой этого ксеноса-мясореза в заднице? Почем мне знать, чьи это слова — твои или его? Почем мне знать, в какую интригу ты меня втянешь?"

{n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"
languages.original_text: {n}Воин поднимает бровь.{/n} "А ты точно слуга Императора, а не кукла с рукой этого ксеноса-мясореза в заднице? Почем мне знать, чьи это слова — твои или его? Почем мне знать, в какую интригу ты меня втянешь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Are you a human, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Are you a human, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Are you a human, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这个战士扬了扬眉毛。{/n}“你真的是帝皇的仆人吗？还是那个异形的傀儡，屁股里塞着他的爪子？我怎么知道你这些话是你自己的想法，还是他的想法？我怎么知道你打算把我拉入什么样的阴谋里面？”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个战士扬了扬眉毛。{/n}“你真的是人类吗？还是那个异形的傀儡，屁股里塞着他的爪子？我怎么知道你这些话是你自己的想法，还是他的想法？我怎么知道你打算把我拉入什么样的阴谋里面？”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}戦士は眉を上げた。{/n}「あんたは皇帝に仕えているのか？あの異種族の屠殺者に飼いならされた人形の間違いじゃなくて？今の言葉があんたの本心か、奴の罠なのか、俺にわかるはずがない。俺を騙して何かに巻き込もうとしてるのかもしれないじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士は眉を上げた。{/n}「あんたは皇帝に仕えているのか？あの異種族の屠殺者に飼いならされた人形の間違いじゃなくて？今の言葉があんたの本心か、奴の罠なのか、俺にわかるはずがない。俺を騙して何かに巻き込もうとしてるのかもしれないじゃないか」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El guerrero arquea las cejas.{/n} «¿Sirve al Emperador o es una marioneta con la mano de ese carnicero xenos metida por el culo? ¿Cómo puedo saber de quién son las palabras que dice: suyas o de él? ¿Y cómo voy a saber en qué clase de intrigas intenta meterme?».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero arquea las cejas.{/n} «¿Es un ser humano o una marioneta con la mano de ese carnicero xenos metida por el culo? ¿Cómo puedo saber de quién son las palabras que dice: suyas o de él? ¿Y cómo voy a saber en qué clase de intrigas intenta meterme?».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Êtes-vous vraiment {mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur, ou un pantin entre les mains de ce boucher xénos ? Comment savoir si ces mots viennent de vous ou de lui ? Comment savoir dans quel complot vous essayez de m'impliquer ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Êtes-vous vraiment {mf|un humain|une humaine}, ou un pantin entre les mains de ce boucher xénos ? Comment savoir si ces mots viennent de vous ou de lui ? Comment savoir dans quel complot vous essayez de m'impliquer ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Dient Ihr dem Imperator oder seid Ihr eine Puppe, in deren Arsch die Hand dieses Xenos-Schlachters steckt? Woher soll ich wissen, wessen Worte Ihr sprecht – Eure oder seine? Woher soll ich wissen, in was für ein Vorhaben Ihr mich hineinziehen wollt?"
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieger zieht die Augenbrauen hoch.{/n} "Seid Ihr ein Mensch oder eine Puppe, in deren Arsch die Hand dieses Xenos-Schlachters steckt? Woher soll ich wissen, wessen Worte Ihr sprecht – Eure oder seine? Woher soll ich wissen, in was für ein Vorhaben Ihr mich hineinziehen wollt?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

languages.text: {n}Savaşçı, kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "İmparator'a mı hizmet ediyorsun yoksa şu zeno kasabının kıçından oynattığı bir kukla mısın? Söylediğin sözlerin sana mı yoksa ona mı ait olduğunu nasıl bileyim? Beni ne tür bir kumpasa çekmeye çalıştığını nasıl bileyim?"
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior raises his eyebrows.{/n} "Do you serve the Emperor, or are you a puppet with the hand of that xenos butcher up your arse? How am I to know whose words you speak — yours or his? How am I to know what plot you are trying to draw me into?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçı, kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "İmparator'a mı hizmet ediyorsun yoksa şu zeno kasabının kıçından oynattığı bir kukla mısın? Söylediğin sözlerin sana mı yoksa ona mı ait olduğunu nasıl bileyim? Beni ne tür bir kumpasa çekmeye çalıştığını nasıl bileyim?"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
